articles.title: Woman who left her AirPods on a flight tracked them down to an airport worker's HOME - Daily Mail
articles.description: A woman who left her AirPods on a flight and was told she couldn't retrieve them has revealed she tracked them down to an air steward's home.
articles.content:
A woman who left her AirPods on a flight and was told she couldn't retrieve them has revealed she tracked them down to an airport employee's home. 
Alisabeth Hayden claims the worker had promised to… [+2927 chars]

articles.title: Accenture puts 19,000 staffers' heads on the chopping block - The Register
articles.description: 2.5% of workforce to go as sales and margin growth forecasts dip
articles.content:
Accenture is erasing the jobs of 19,000 employees - with in-house IT workers confirmed on the front line - after it trimmed revenue projections for the rest of its current fiscal 2023.
